description.heading: Standard Cargo
description.description: Start with the essentials of delivering standard parcels, focusing on efficiency and reliability.

description.heading: Premium Cargo
description.description: Transporting larger, heavier packages challenges your delivery skills and route optimization for higher rewards and increased demand.

description.heading: Trailer Delivery
description.description: Begin transporting trailers from location A to B, enhancing your delivery capacity and logistical challenges.

unlocks.heading: Small Trailers
unlocks.description: Deliver small and medium-sized trailers using cars and pickup trucks.

description.heading: Heavy-duty Trailers
description.description: Take on the challenge of delivering large trailers. Hone your skills in truck handling and logistics for major hauls.

description.heading: Fluids Delivery
description.description: Specialize in transporting fluid materials with tanker trailers, coordinating multiple drop-offs per journey.
